job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Within the Data Office, we have a team responsible for building impactful AI solutions. With these AI solutions, we help our business unit Schade & Inkomen to digitize important processes. An example of this is the digitization of our Claims processes. Your main goal is to deploy/roll out the AI solutions of your colleagues/the AI solution made together with your colleagues in a scalable and secure way., In the past year, we have set up various applications using LLMs and we are now looking for an experienced Machine Learning Engineer to further scale these applications and help build new AI solutions. You provide a clear vision of the required Cloud architecture and manage it for our AI solutions. With your solution-oriented and proactive mindset, you help the team scale and make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy. We work agile with colleagues from the business on projects that are often sprint-transcending.

   In concrete terms, you bring AI solutions to production so that your solutions really create value for our company of tomorrow. Exploring and applying new technology plays an important role. In addition, you actively contribute to innovation within NN. During our monthly innovation day, you investigate with your colleagues which new techniques are applicable within our company.
job_details.full_text:
Azure Genai Devops Engineer

Within the Data Office, we have a team responsible for building impactful AI solutions. With these AI solutions, we help our business unit Schade & Inkomen to digitize important processes. An example of this is the digitization of our Claims processes. Your main goal is to deploy/roll out the AI solutions of your colleagues/the AI solution made together with your colleagues in a scalable and secure way., In the past year, we have set up various applications using LLMs and we are now looking for an experienced Machine Learning Engineer to further scale these applications and help build new AI solutions. You provide a clear vision of the required Cloud architecture and manage it for our AI solutions. With your solution-oriented and proactive mindset, you help the team scale and make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy. We work agile with colleagues from the business on projects that are often sprint-transcending.

   In concrete terms, you bring AI solutions to production so that your solutions really create value for our company of tomorrow. Exploring and applying new technology plays an important role. In addition, you actively contribute to innovation within NN. During our monthly innovation day, you investigate with your colleagues which new techniques are applicable within our company.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes deploying and scaling AI solutions built with LLMs, focusing on productionizing these models and building scalable, secure cloud architectures for them. This aligns strongly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in the areas of MLOps and software development around generative models.

phrases.phrase: help our business unit Schade & Inkomen to digitize important processes
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of the business unit's needs and how AI solutions can be applied to digitize their processes.

phrases.phrase: make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy
phrases.justification: This highlights the need to align AI solutions with business problems and ensure they deliver value.

phrases.phrase: bring AI solutions to production so that your solutions really create value for our company of tomorrow
phrases.justification: This directly links the technical deployment of AI solutions to creating business value and future company success.

phrases.phrase: building impactful AI solutions
phrases.justification: This is a general statement that implies the creation or adaptation of AI models.

phrases.phrase: applications using LLMs
phrases.justification: This specifically mentions the use of Large Language Models, a core component of generative AI modeling.

phrases.phrase: help build new AI solutions
phrases.justification: This indicates involvement in the creation or development of AI models and solutions.

phrases.phrase: deploy/roll out the AI solutions of your colleagues/the AI solution made together with your colleagues in a scalable and secure way
phrases.justification: This involves taking AI solutions and integrating them into production systems, requiring software development practices for scalability and security.

phrases.phrase: further scale these applications
phrases.justification: Scaling applications involves software engineering principles to handle increased load and usage.

phrases.phrase: provide a clear vision of the required Cloud architecture and manage it for our AI solutions
phrases.justification: Designing and managing cloud architecture for AI solutions is a software development task focused on infrastructure and deployment.

phrases.phrase: build new AI solutions
phrases.justification: While modeling is involved, building solutions often implies developing the surrounding software components and integrations.

phrases.phrase: deploy/roll out the AI solutions ... in a scalable and secure way
phrases.justification: Deployment and rollout in a scalable and secure manner are core MLOps responsibilities.

phrases.phrase: further scale these applications
phrases.justification: Scaling production applications is a key aspect of MLOps.

phrases.phrase: provide a clear vision of the required Cloud architecture and manage it for our AI solutions
phrases.justification: Managing cloud architecture for AI solutions in production falls under MLOps.

phrases.phrase: make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy
phrases.justification: Ensuring solutions are production-worthy involves the operational aspects of deployment, monitoring, and maintenance.

phrases.phrase: bring AI solutions to production
phrases.justification: This is a direct statement of MLOps responsibility: getting models and solutions into a production environment.

phrases.phrase: Exploring and applying new technology plays an important role.
phrases.justification: This highlights the need to stay updated with and adopt new technologies.

phrases.phrase: During our monthly innovation day, you investigate with your colleagues which new techniques are applicable within our company.
phrases.justification: This describes a proactive approach to learning and applying new techniques.

phrases.phrase: solution-oriented
phrases.justification: Indicates a focus on finding practical solutions to problems.

phrases.phrase: make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy
phrases.justification: This implies analyzing business problems and developing effective, production-ready solutions.

phrases.phrase: actively contribute to innovation within NN
phrases.justification: This shows a drive to be involved in and contribute to new ideas and advancements.

phrases.phrase: take initiative
phrases.justification: Implied by 'solution-oriented and proactive mindset' and 'actively contribute to innovation'.

phrases.phrase: colleagues/the AI solution made together with your colleagues
phrases.justification: Indicates working collaboratively with others on AI solutions.

phrases.phrase: work agile with colleagues from the business
phrases.justification: Highlights collaboration with business stakeholders in an agile environment.
